app.name: Dad jokes app
app.short_description: Because there is a dad in all of us ... somewhere
app.long_description: Bagginses and Boffins, Tooks and Brandybucks, Grubbs, Chubbs, Hornblowers, Bolgers, Bracegirdles and Proudfoots.
app.installation_instructions: Install, install, that's all you have to do! Click the button, takes little to nothin' and let puns fly straight and true.
